GPT

Change Negotiations GPT

Custom GPT tool designed to give you more information about the Change Negotiations journey in Finland crafted by people with firsthand experience. We’re in this together.

GPT

Change Negotiations GPT

Custom GPT tool designed to give you more information about the Change Negotiations journey in Finland crafted by people with firsthand experience. We’re in this together.

What are my rights during the layoff period? If I find a new job do I need to let my current employer know? Can my employer fire me during layoff period? Explain change negotiations as if I’m a five year-old
